metadata.Title: CVE-2017-3099 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium
metadata.Description:
Adobe Flash Player versions 26.0.0.131 and earlier have an exploitablememory corruption vulnerability in the Action Script 3 raster data model.Successful exploitation could lead to arbitrary code execution.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2017-3099` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

flashplugin-downloader - 26.0.0.137ubuntu0.14.04.1
flashplugin-installer - 26.0.0.137ubuntu0.14.04.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: flashplugin-nonfree package in trusty was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '26.0.0.137ubuntu0.14.04.1').
